name: Smart Yoga Mat
description: A yoga mat with built-in sensors to track your poses and provide real-time feedback.
benefits: Tracks performance metrics like balance and weight distribution.
Syncs with your smartphone for pose corrections.

name: Yoga Tracker Band
description: A wearable band to monitor your movements, breathing patterns, and heart rate during yoga sessions.
benefits: Tracks body alignment and pose duration.
Measures stress levels with breathing insights.
Lightweight and syncs seamlessly with yoga apps.

name: Smart Yoga Blocks
description: Smart blocks equipped with sensors to guide proper posture and improve alignment.
benefits: Provides instant feedback on pose adjustments.

name: AI Yoga Assistant Speaker
description: A voice-activated assistant that guides you through yoga routines and meditation.
benefits: Offers guided instructions for poses and flows.
Tracks progress and adapts to your skill level.
Compact design with relaxing audio support.

name: Posture-Correcting Yoga Wear
description: Smart yoga wear with built-in sensors that vibrate to alert you about incorrect postures.
benefits: Encourages correct posture through gentle vibrations.
Comfortable, stretchable fabric for all-day wear.
Tracks muscle activity and offers improvement tips.

name: Interactive Yoga Mirror
description: A high-tech mirror that streams yoga classes and provides real-time corrections.
benefits: Stylish addition to your workout space.
